biotools.summary: BIONIC (Biological Network Integration using Convolutions) is a deep-learning based biological network integration algorithm that incorporates graph convolutional networks (GCNs) to learn integrated features for genes or proteins across input networks.

bioschemas.name: BIONIC
bioschemas.summary: BIONIC (Biological Network Integration using Convolutions) is a deep-learning based biological network integration algorithm that incorporates graph convolutional networks (GCNs) to learn integrated features for genes or proteins across input networks.
